description: RIA-1939 Send appeal (dismissed) decision notification to Home Office and Legal Representative - Admin Officer

notifications.subject: Immigration and Asylum appeal: decision and reasons
body: The Tribunal has made a decision about this appeal
The grounds for this decision are explained in the Decision and Reasons document.
Visit the online service and use the reference given in this email to find the case. You can then view and download the Decision and Reasons document from the Documents tab.
If the appellant's legal representative thinks there's a legal error in the Tribunal's decision, they may apply for permission to appeal to the Upper Tribunal (Immigration and Asylum Chamber).
The Home Office will be notified if the appellant asks for permission to appeal.
